description: A playful spin on oranges and concentration
title: Smarty Fruit
n_1: Oliver Orange boasts about his smarts at the Fruit Meet.
c1_1: Guess why I'm the brainiest here?
c2_1: Is it because you’re round and roll in universities?
n_2: Benny Banana chuckles at his own joke.
n_3: Oliver explains his unique ability to focus.
c1_3: Exactly, I’m literally made to concentrate!
c2_3: Show me then, squeeze some wisdom!
n_4: They laugh, sharing a friendly banter.
c1_4: Let’s just say, I’m naturally gifted.
c2_4: Why are oranges the smartest fruit?
